meanings.sent1: The result of the game was contested by both teams.
meanings.sent2: The decision was contested by many people in the room.
meanings.sent3: The contested issue led to a heated debate among the students.
meanings.sent4: Her contested opinion sparked a lively discussion.
meanings.sent5: The contested land caused tension between the neighbors.

meanings.definition: Engage in competition to attain (a position of power).
meanings.sent1: The two candidates contested fiercely for the presidency.
meanings.sent2: They will contest in the final round of the competition.
meanings.sent3: The siblings contested playfully for the last cookie.
meanings.sent4: She contested her way to the top of the leaderboard.
meanings.sent5: The athletes will contest for the gold medal tomorrow.
